name: Brian O'Connell
description:
'''Brian O'Connell''' is an American musician, record producer, and actor, best known for being the [[bassist]] and producer for Pakistani [[sufi rock]] band [[Junoon (band)|Junoon]].

O'Connell joined Junoon at the request of guitarist [[Salman Ahmad]], following keyboardist [[Nusrat Hussain]]'s departure from the band. He is known for his use of five string bass. Following the release of the band's seventh studio album, ''[[Dewaar]]'', O'Connell moved back to the United States, although he remains a member of Junoon.
